spec_data.Name: perl-Module-Find
spec_data.Description:
Module::Find lets you find and use modules in categories. This can be very
useful for auto-detecting driver or plug-in modules. You can differentiate
between looking in the category itself or in all subcategories.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 01:21:16 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Find and use installed modules in a (sub)category
